org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore

类 DatastoreContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.DatastoreContext
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ClientActorConfig

    public class DatastoreContext
extends Object
implements ClientActorConfig
    Contains contextual data for a data store.

    Thomas Pantelis
